name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @AdamHSays: “There can be no healing of the soul of America without healing the body.”

My conversation with ⁦@RevDrBarber⁩ about healing and why it means more than just a return to “normal.” https://t.co/uZkwpFpLy0

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @UriLF: Democracy depends on the consent of the losers. And we're witnessing something unprecedented: an American president not consenting to his loss. So what does that mean for American democracy? My latest for @TheAtlantic https://t.co/drTkG14J8b

name: TheAtlantic
text: A new biography of James Beard vividly traces the lines between the cookbook author’s memories and his palate. But it overextends when it tries to turn the story of his life into a foundation myth for American culinary identity. @madelesque writes: https://t.co/0ekmvHrIk6

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @AnnieLowrey: GDP is down 5.3 percent in Japan, 6 percent in Germany, 7.1 percent in Canada, ~10 percent in the U.K. and France .... and just 4 percent in the U.S. I look at why, why that's not necessarily a great thing, and why our run might be over in @TheAtlantic: https://t.co/RYJctiJMNi
